name: New Earth - Trappist-1 Exploration Program
description:
Controls:

Arrows or WSAD - moves camera
HOME - Centers camera on main base
Z / X / C / V - Places buildings
F / G / H - Places turrets
CTRL + [1-0] - Saves camera position
[1-0] - Jumps to previously saved camera position

Made on TK Game Jam in 48 hours by 3 people team:

  • Damian Komorowski
  • Adam Kasza
  • Marek Chudy
